class.name: MultiMeshInstance2D
class.description: [MultiMeshInstance2D] is a specialized node to instance a [MultiMesh] resource in 2D. Usage is the same as [MultiMeshInstance].

members.member: The [MultiMesh] that will be drawn by the [MultiMeshInstance2D].
The normal map that will be used if using the default [CanvasItemMaterial].
The [Texture] that will be used if using the default [CanvasItemMaterial]. Can be accessed as [code]TEXTURE[/code] in CanvasItem shader.
